TopicTitle: my first ever precise-ish(with help of mods) landing

Articles.Content:
sorry for not more pics. I thought"lets land this." I played with a maneuver node and trajectories, and came up with a node. I then executed it, but I was about a bit off target. I burned north -(insert gravity turn direction here) and I then opened a parachute really low.

the lack of jeb is because I am leaving this as a memorial to my first precise landing(this is sandbox.)

will show more pictures whe I re-open ksp and take more.
